title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Brian Kelly from the criticism he received for leaving Notre Dame for LSU before the end of the season and what this says about the state of the Irish with the College Football Playoff on the horizon. He explains why comparing Mac Jones to Tom Brady at this point in their careers is actually fair and makes a lot of sense. He tells you which NFL team will have the most leverage this off season in the quarterback market. Plus, Fox Sports College Football reporter Bruce Feldman joins the show to discuss what Lincoln Riley has to do in order to rebuild USC into a national title contender and if Brian Kelly will succeed at LSU. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
